name: Lunar Front EZ
description:
Lunafront EZ is an RTS inspired by my favorite games "Armored Core", "Carnage Heart" and "Guillen's Ambition"! Actually, I was going to implement a command system, and an idea that gives mechs value of remaining bullet and also prepares a facility that allows them to supply ammo, but I couldn't do that because I hadn't enough time...

It is still under development and has many bugs. Moreover, there are not enough explanations and tutorials to tell you about the game system... but I think it is at least playable. I hope you enjoy playing it!

I've never made an English game, and this is the first game to submit a foreign game jam, so I think there may be containing some mistakes in grammar and word choice, but please go easy on me!

*Caution! Windows desktop edition has a bug that show you the message “Mission Failed” even if you win.

<br/>Z: Decide<br/>Up/down arrow: Select menu<br/>


Z: Ready
D: Switch Status
Left/Right arrow: select parts
Right buttom buttons: Save your mechs


Esc: Go title
P: Pause/Unpause
WASD/Arrow Keys: Move camera
Z: Magnify
X: Reduce
R: Camera Reset
H: Hide tutorial texts
Left Click: Click base/factory and open factory window
Right Click: Click and close factory window
